node.title: VoiceFlowPro Landing Immediate Execution Backlog
node.comment: Priority actions for the next development cycle derived from business goals, landing task requirements, and recent Stripe/download/auth progress.

node.title: Stabilize Commerce Flow
node.comment: Ensure signup → checkout → confirmation works end-to-end in test mode with production-ready safeguards.

node.title: Finalize Stripe Subscription Flow
node.comment: Resolve client_secret retrieval, handle finalized invoices, store customer+subscription IDs, surface errors to UI, add success screen.

node.comment: Create `/api/stripe/webhook` verifying signature, handling `invoice.payment_succeeded`, `invoice.payment_failed`, update user plans, send notifications.

node.title: Checkout UX Polish
node.comment: Add plan summary, VAT entry, error toasts, spinner states, redirect to onboarding upon success.

node.title: Download Delivery Pipeline
node.comment: Ship reliable software bundle distribution strategy.

node.title: Hosting Decision
node.comment: Choose GitHub Releases vs S3 + CloudFront, define folder structure, retention policy, access control.

node.title: Release Automation
node.comment: Integrate CI to build artifacts, publish checksums, update manifest JSON for `/api/downloads/manifest`.

node.title: Download Page Enhancements
node.comment: Show release notes, version metadata, fallback messaging when artifact unavailable, track click events.

node.title: Authentication Hardening
node.comment: Complete signup/login baseline for production.

node.title: Password Reset Flow
node.comment: Implement token-based reset email, rate limiting, expiration policy.

node.title: Email Verification
node.comment: Optional but recommended before GA to reduce fraud; leverage transactional email provider.

node.title: Session Security
node.comment: Configure secure cookie, idle timeout, CSRF protection, audit logging.

node.title: Legal & Compliance Workstream
node.comment: Kick off legal document drafting plan.

node.title: Draft Key Policies
node.comment: Customize Terms, Privacy Policy, License using templates; cover audio ownership, AI processing, GDPR rights.

node.title: French Legal Requirements
node.comment: Produce Mentions Légales, CGV, consumer protection disclosures, support CNIL documentation.

node.title: Professional Review
node.comment: Engage LegalStart/CGV-Expert budget < €300; incorporate feedback, publish on site.

node.title: Analytics & Measurement Setup
node.comment: Lay foundation for KPIs.

node.title: Implement GA4 + PostHog
node.comment: Track page views, CTA clicks, signup events, checkout submissions, subscription success.

node.title: Dashboard Definition
node.comment: Design KPI dashboard for leadership: traffic, conversions, revenue, newsletter signups.

node.title: Content & SEO Sprint
node.comment: Create launch-ready content assets.

node.title: Hero & Pricing Copy
node.comment: Refine messaging to match legal/media target segments; highlight privacy, accuracy, compliance.

node.title: Use Case Pages
node.comment: Draft landing sections for legal teams, podcasters, media houses with CTA to signup.

node.title: Newsletter Lead Magnet
node.comment: Create downloadable checklist/whitepaper to drive 4% opt-in goal.

node.title: Operational Foundations
node.comment: Put in place internal processes enabling scale.

node.title: CI/CD Pipeline
node.comment: Create automated test/build/deploy to staging & production; include env secret management.

node.title: Support Readiness
node.comment: Define support channels (email/chat), response SLAs, knowledge base skeleton, incident escalation.
